image-alt: flowers in front of the library
headline: Library Services Go Online
paragraph: As part of the statewide response to COVID-19, the library building will be closed until further notice. We continue to offer extensive online resources. Please check our COVID-19 Page for up-to-date information.

headline: Featured Resource: Swank Streaming Video
paragraph: The Library's subscription to Swank Digital Campus offers streaming of feature films and documentaries produced by major Hollywood and independent studios.

headline: Vandal Poem of the Day
paragraph: In its five years, VPoD has published over 650 poems from more than 200 poets. This year the site features poems from Canarium Books and Flood Editions.

headline: Featured Resource: Safari Books Online
paragraph: Access thousands of ebooks, videos, and courses in tech, business, communications, design, management, and more with O’Reilly’s Learning Platform for Higher Education.

headline: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
